displayProperties.description: Defeat opponents and claim their crests.
displayProperties.name: Supremacy

displayProperties.description: The Darkness grows stronger. Form a fireteam of three and face our enemies with new challenges.
displayProperties.name: Lost Sector

displayProperties.description: Create a custom Gambit match with your fireteam. Bang knuckles with your crew for personal glory and bragging rights.
displayProperties.name: Private Match

displayProperties.description: Embark on adventures alone or with a fireteam to push back the Darkness and reclaim our lost worlds.
displayProperties.name: Story

displayProperties.description: Deploy the Breaker to expose your opponents' vault. Then, hack their vault to plunder it.
displayProperties.name: Breakthrough

displayProperties.description: Defeat the enemies of humanity, collect their Motes, and bank them to summon a Primeval. First team to destroy their Primeval wins.
displayProperties.name: Gambit

displayProperties.description: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Nightfall

displayProperties.description:
"You've got a Scorch Cannon, they've got Scorch Cannons. Make a mess." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor by defeating opponents using Scorch Cannons.
Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Nightfall

displayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of up to three, and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.
displayProperties.name: Dungeon

displayProperties.description: Defeat the enemies of humanity, collect their Motes, and bank them to summon a Primeval. First team to destroy their Primeval wins.
displayProperties.name: Gambit

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.
displayProperties.name: Classified

displayProperties.description: Wander the frontier. Search the ruins of the Golden Age, claim vital supplies, and hunt down our enemies wherever they dare trespass.
displayProperties.name: Explore

displayProperties.description: Face your fellow Guardians in open combat. Prove your worth, and you will be rewarded.
displayProperties.name: Rumble

displayProperties.description: Embark on adventures alone or with a fireteam to push back the Darkness and reclaim our lost worlds.
displayProperties.name: Story

displayProperties.description: Choose your role in this intense single-round evolution of Gambit. Send Blockers to drain Motes from the enemy's bank. Create a Well of Light by defeating envoys. Stand in the Well to burn down the Primeval and win.
displayProperties.name: Gambit Prime

displayProperties.description:
"I've ensured the Crucible has new offerings in anticipation of Osiris's return. Fight without hesitation or mercy. Crush your opponents." —Lord Shaxx 

Focus on new expansion maps and win glory and honor.
displayProperties.name: Osiris Competitive

displayProperties.description:
"To novices, the Crucible is filled with tough lessons. For veterans like you, it is a litany of lessons yet to be taught. Teach well, my friend." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor in a variety of game modes using connection-based matchmaking.
displayProperties.name: Classic Mix

displayProperties.description: Use the prescribed loadout.
displayProperties.name: Armsweek

displayProperties.description: Meet other Guardians as they prepare for new adventures.
displayProperties.name: Social

displayProperties.description: Embark on adventures alone or with a fireteam to push back the Darkness and reclaim our lost worlds.
displayProperties.name: Story

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.
displayProperties.name: Classified

displayProperties.description: Form a fireteam of six and brave the strange and powerful realms of our enemies.
displayProperties.name: Raid

displayProperties.description: Eliminate your opponents or capture the zone to win. Earn as many round and match wins on a ticket as you can.
displayProperties.name: Trials of Osiris

displayProperties.description:
"Outlive your foes, and there can be no possible outcome but victory." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Glory by depleting your opponents' shared life pool, then eliminating them.
displayProperties.name: Survival

displayProperties.description: Embark on adventures alone or with a fireteam to push back the Darkness and reclaim our lost worlds.
displayProperties.name: Story

displayProperties.description: Participate in experimental, work-in-progress Crucible experiences. For more information on Crucible Labs, visit bungie.net.
displayProperties.name: Crucible Labs

displayProperties.description: Fight for Glory in more focused combat scenarios.
displayProperties.name: Survival

displayProperties.description:
"Hold your ground. Yield to no one." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor by capturing and holding zones. Win rounds instantly by capturing all three.
displayProperties.name: Lockdown

displayProperties.description: Defeat the enemies of humanity, collect their Motes, and bank them to summon a Primeval. First team to destroy their Primeval wins.
displayProperties.name: Gambit

displayProperties.description:
"Your partner is your life." —Lord Shaxx 

Fight alongside a teammate and work together to crush your opponents.
displayProperties.name: Crimson Days

displayProperties.description: Create a custom Gambit or Gambit Prime match with your fireteam. Bang knuckles with your crew for personal glory and bragging rights.
displayProperties.name: Private Match

displayProperties.description: Embark on adventures alone or with a fireteam to push back the Darkness and reclaim our lost worlds.
displayProperties.name: Story

displayProperties.description: Venture into the mysterious Haul that the Drifter tows behind his ship to reckon with greater powers.
displayProperties.name: The Reckoning

displayProperties.description: Fight for Valor in large-scale combat scenarios.
displayProperties.name: Control

displayProperties.description:
"This combat drill will test you from start to finish. Stay on your game, lest you find yourself on the wrong end of the final showdown." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor by defeating opponents and preventing revives. Win the most rounds or face off in an elimination showdown.
Wander the frontier. Search the ruins of the Golden Age, claim vital supplies, and hunt down our enemies wherever they dare trespass.
displayProperties.name: Explore

displayProperties.description: Faster Supers, abilities, and Heavy ammo spawns—withstand and engage in a whirlwind of chaos.
displayProperties.name: Mayhem

displayProperties.description: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Strike

displayProperties.description:
"You've been capturing zones and destroying your enemies for a long time, haven't you? Let's pick up the pace a bit." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor by capturing zones and defeating opponents. All weapons are more lethal, abilities replenish only on kills, and tracker is disabled.
displayProperties.name: Momentum Control

displayProperties.description: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Op

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.
displayProperties.name: Classified

displayProperties.description:
"The Crucible is a strange thing when you think about it. We die over and over, that we may live in the end." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor by defeating opponents.
displayProperties.name: Clash

displayProperties.description:
"I hope the remaining Red Legion can see this: weapons they brought to destroy us, used as mere toys in training exercises. Do be mindful of the blast radius, though." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor by detonating a charge, defusing the opposing charge, or eliminating all opponents.
displayProperties.name: Countdown

displayProperties.description: Fight for Valor in large-scale combat scenarios.
displayProperties.name: Control

displayProperties.description:
"You used to like this one, didn't you? I've been making some adjustments; help me get this ready for the new recruits." —Lord Shaxx

Fight for Valor by eliminating all opponents. This mode is experimental. Revive mechanics and Heavy ammo rules will change throughout the season.
displayProperties.name: Labs: Elimination

displayProperties.description: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Strike

displayProperties.description:
"Osiris is back. And so is the Crucible. Take risks, learn from your mistakes, and fight on." —Lord Shaxx 

Explore and play with a focus on new expansion maps.
displayProperties.name: Osiris Quickplay

displayProperties.description: Meet other Guardians as they prepare for new adventures.
displayProperties.name: Social

displayProperties.description: Join a fireteam of three and face the most feared minions of the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Strike

displayProperties.description: Create a custom PvP match with your fireteam, and best your comrades for personal glory… and bragging rights.
displayProperties.name: Private Match

displayProperties.description: Only the best of the best may step foot onto these hallowed grounds. You must be found worthy by achieving 7 wins with no losses to gain access.
displayProperties.name: Lighthouse Simulation

displayProperties.description: Fight alongside a teammate, and work together to crush your opponents.
displayProperties.name: Doubles
